title:
Modelling Lifetime Data and Athletes Red Cells Counts
Using the New Topp-Leone-Lomax Poisson Distribution
content:
A new compounded distribution called the Topp-Leone-Lomax Poisson
is developed. The statistical properties of this model are derived. The
model parameters are estimated via the maximum likelihood technique.
The performance of the estimation techniques was assessed by means
of simulation studies. The new model was exposed to three data sets
and compared to other models within the same class and the evidence
supports the importance of the new model in data modelling.
